translation: Drupada and the sons of Draupadi, O Lord of the Earth, and the son of Subhadra, the mighty-armed, blew their conches each separately.
commentary: 1.18 Drupada Drupada? Draupadi's the sons of Draupadi? f and? All in all? Prithivipate O Lord of the earth? Saubhadra the son of Subhadra (Abhimanyu)? f and mightyarmed the mightyarmed? Conches conches? Dadhmuh blew? separately separately.Commentary This blowing of conches announced the commencement of the battle.
